desc: BC 획득시 BB게이지 상승량 증가 및 공격력 방어력 회복력 최대 HP 15% 상승

dictionary.lore: This Sphere was created by Noel of the Akras Summoners' Research Lab. Dubbed the "Heresy Series," these Spheres were apparently created to help the mock Units he had created to evolve. However, though it sounds like their purpose may not be so uncommon, they hide power and abilities beyond the imaginable. Rumors about this orb and Noel's reproduction of it in large numbers continue to spread rapidly.

name: 마도기 크로우걸
